name: Maggot-Infested Bird
description: Just a common bird that has now gained super-bird powers. However, it is now covered in writhing maggots that feast on its decaying flesh. Its wings are tattered, and its movements are sluggish.

name: Abhorrently Large Cockroach
description: A monstrous cockroach of unnatural size, its chitinous exoskeleton gleams in the dim light. Its legs scuttle with an eerie quickness, leaving a trail of poisionous filth.

name: Lingering Bookworm
description: A mutated bookworm that has grown to an alarming size. Its body is covered in tiny, wriggling tendrils, and it hungers for the taste of knowledge and flesh alike.

name: Final Boss
description: This final boss has your 'A' level exam certificate.
